name: Asteria of the White Woods
text: You can send 1 Spell/Trap from your hand or field to the GY; Special Summon 1 LIGHT Spellcaster Tuner from your Deck. If a Spell(s)/Trap(s) is sent to your GY to activate a monster effect while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Asteria of the White Woods" once per turn.
